page.title: 06Education,Abermorddu & Area
page.content: There are three{primary schools}in the survey block. {Cross Street School,}Cefnybedd was closed in 1970 and was sold in 1985.It is now undergoing conversion into flats. {St. Mary's C.P.,Brymbo}is a voluntary aided school. The original school was built in 1850-51. This closed in 1974 when the school moved to the site of the former secondary modern school. The school has 160 full-time pupils aged from 5 to 11 and 26 part-time nursery pupils. There are six full-time and two part-time teachers. The{Church in Wales}bears the cost of repairs to the outside fabric of the school and is represented on the Governing Body. {R.E. }is taught according to the Church syllabus and is inspected by the Bishop of St.Asaph's nominee.
